title: Ep247 Forensic Psychology
description: This week, the gals get clinical and chat about some psychological head-scratchers. Topics include "the worst serial killer I've ever dealt with," one very disgruntled employee story that might sound surprisingly familiar... and what the heck forensic psychology even means. Grab a glass of Winc Far + Wide Frappato, make a therapy appointment, and tune in for Forensic Psychology.
